partner_concern: UBERON:0016529 incorrectly used for visceral adipose tissue

uberon_0016529.label: cortex of cerebral lobe
uberon_0016529.description: Grey matter neocortex region of a lobe of the cerebral hemisphere.
synonyms: cortex of lobe of cerebral hemisphere
gray matter of lobe of cerebral hemisphere

uberon_0014454.label: visceral abdominal adipose tissue
uberon_0014454.description: Subcutaneous adipose tissue that is located in the peritoneal cavity.

UBERON:0001013.label: adipose tissue
UBERON:0001013.description: Portion of connective tissue composed of adipocytes enmeshed in areolar tissue.

UBERON:0002190.label: subcutaneous adipose tissue
UBERON:0002190.description: A portion of adipose tissue that is part of the hypodermis, beneath the dermis.

UBERON:0003427.label: abdominal fat pad
UBERON:0003427.description: The encapsulated adipose tissue in the abdomen.
